languages.text: "Именем фон Валанциус нарекаю твою невесту придворной дамой. И освобождаю ее от служения при дворе".

traits.locale_text: "Именем фон Валанциус, нарекаю твою невесту придворной дамой. И освобождаю ее от служения при дворе".

languages.text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."
languages.original_text: "Именем фон Валанциус нарекаю твою невесту придворной дамой. И освобождаю ее от служения при дворе".

traits.locale_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."
"In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."
"In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."
"In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

languages.text: “以冯·瓦兰修斯家族的名义，我在此宣布你的未婚妻正式成为贵族阶层的女士，解除她在相关方面的义务。”
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: “以冯·瓦兰修斯家族的名义，我在此宣布你的未婚妻正式成为贵族阶层的女士，解除她在相关方面的义务。”

languages.text: «En nombre de la casa von Valancius, por la presente nombro a su prometida dama de la corte y la libero de todas sus obligaciones».
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: «En nombre de la casa von Valancius, por la presente nombro a su prometida dama de la corte y la libero de todas sus obligaciones».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の名の下に、お前のフィアンセを宮廷で召し抱えよう。さらに、あらゆる義務を免除してやろう」
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の名の下に、お前のフィアンセを宮廷で召し抱えよう。さらに、あらゆる義務を免除してやろう」

languages.text: « Au nom de la maison von Valancius, je déclare votre fiancée dame de la cour et je la libère de toutes ses obligations actuelles. »
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de la maison von Valancius, je déclare votre fiancée dame de la cour et je la libère de toutes ses obligations actuelles. »

languages.text: "Im Namen des Hauses von Valancius ernenne ich hiermit Eure Verlobte zu einer Hofdame. Und entbinde sie von jeglichen bisherigen Verpflichtungen."
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Hauses von Valancius ernenne ich hiermit Eure Verlobte zu einer Hofdame. Und entbinde sie von jeglichen bisherigen Verpflichtungen."

languages.text: "Von Valancius Hanesi adına nişanlını artık sarayın leydilerinden biri ilan ediyorum. İlaveten onu tüm yükümlülüklerinden azat ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "In the name of House von Valancius, I hereby make your fiancée a lady of the court. And release her from any obligations thereto."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius Hanesi adına nişanlını artık sarayın leydilerinden biri ilan ediyorum. İlaveten onu tüm yükümlülüklerinden azat ediyorum."
